text: 2.16: Sek 9.10; Ro 6.6; 8.3; Kor 1.20; 2.14Ana khanarareŋ ga ntorgap rimgiap, mba fhum panan wari ga kegi tɨv, ana ana shogim, ana vhɨzgi. Ana mba phɨna phuni, ana mani fugɨrim, mani wani tɨgɨp phɨna bavira kim, mani Zisas phorgap kharɨga bavira fara muuŋgiap ki. Ana mani ndigap, Fhe Bakɨme han zi.
